snippet: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions said on Thursday he would stay out of any probe into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 presidential election but maintained he did nothing wrong by failing to disclose he met last year with Russia's ambassado...

headline.main: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back
headline.print_headline: North Korean Suspect in Airport Murder to Be Deported From Malaysia and Not Allowed Back

lead_paragraph: U.S. Attorney General Jeff Sessions said on Thursday he would stay out of any probe into alleged Russian meddling in the 2016 presidential election but maintained he did nothing wrong by failing to disclose he met last year with Russia's ambassador.
